name: FarmYard Racers (DMC Group 2)
description:
A mathematics game in response to the Sumo Digital Brief.
A racing game in which we have removed the ability for the player to control acceleration and change gears in a standard way, and they are instead required to answer maths questions to change gear

Design Master Class Group 2:

  • Amy Potter (Designer)
  • Thomas McLaren (Designer)
  • Thomas McCarthy (Programmer)
